scripts.install-dev: concurrently "cd server && npm install" "cd client && npm install"
scripts.start-dev: concurrently "cd server && npm start"  "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: (cd client && npm install --dev) & (cd server && npm install --dev)
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install --only=dev && NODE_ENV=development npm install --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build
